verses.verse: Now there was a man <S%H376><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Kish <S%H7027><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiel, <S%H22><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeror, <S%H9502><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Becorath, <S%H1064><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aphiah, <S%H647><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Benjamite, <S%H376><s%> <S%H3228><s%> a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H1368><s%> of valor. <S%H2428><s%>

And he had <S%H1961><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Saul, <S%H7586><s%> a choice <S%H970><s%> and handsome <S%H2896><s%> [man,] and there <S%H369><s%> was not a more <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2896><s%> handsome <S%H2896><s%> person <S%H376><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> he among <S%H4480><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> from his shoulders <S%H7926><s%> and up he was taller <S%H1364><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Now the donkeys <S%H860><s%> of Kish, <S%H7027><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s father, were lost. So Kish <S%H1><s%> said <S%H6><s%> to his son <S%H7027><s%> Saul, "Take <S%H559><s%> now <S%H1121><s%> with you one <S%H3947><s%> of the servants, <S%H4994><s%> and arise, <S%H259><s%> go <S%H5288><s%> search <S%H6965><s%> for the donkeys. <S%H1980><s%>"

And he passed <S%H5674><s%> through the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of Shalishah, <S%H8031><s%> but they did not find <S%H4672><s%> [them.] Then they passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of Shaalim, <S%H8171><s%> but [they were] not [there.] Then he passed <S%H5674><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> of the Benjamites, <S%H1145><s%> but they did not find <S%H4672><s%> [them.]

When they came <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Zuph, <S%H6689><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servant <S%H5288><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was with him, "Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us return, <S%H7725><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> my father cease <S%H1><s%> [to be concerned] about <S%H2308><s%> the donkeys <S%H4480><s%> and become <S%H860><s%> anxious <S%H1672><s%> for us."

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> there is a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> is held <S%H3513><s%> in honor; <S%H3513><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he says <S%H1696><s%> surely <S%H935><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> true. Now <S%H6258><s%> let us go <S%H1980><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> he can tell <S%H5046><s%> us about our journey <S%H1870><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> we have set <S%H1980><s%> out."

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servant, <S%H5288><s%> "But behold, <S%H2009><s%> if we go, <S%H1980><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall we bring <S%H935><s%> the man <S%H376><s%>? For the bread <S%H3899><s%> is gone <S%H235><s%> from our sack <S%H3627><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> present <S%H8670><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> do we have <S%H854><s%>?"

And the servant <S%H5288><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have <S%H4672><s%> in my hand <S%H3027><s%> a fourth <S%H7253><s%> of a shekel <S%H8255><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> [it] to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and he will tell <S%H5046><s%> us our way. <S%H1870><s%>"

(Formerly <S%H6440><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when a man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> he used to say, <S%H559><s%> "Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us go <S%H1980><s%> to the seer <S%H9536><s%>"; for [he who is called <S%H7121><s%>] a prophet <S%H5030><s%> now <S%H3117><s%> was formerly <S%H6440><s%> called a seer. <S%H9536><s%>)

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servant, <S%H5288><s%> "Well <S%H2896><s%> said; <S%H1697><s%> come, <S%H1980><s%> let us go. <S%H1980><s%>" So they went <S%H1980><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was.

As they went <S%H5927><s%> up the slope <S%H4608><s%> to the city, <S%H5892><s%> they found <S%H4672><s%> young <S%H5291><s%> women <S%H5291><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out to draw <S%H7579><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Is the seer <S%H9536><s%> here <S%H2088><s%>?"

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> them and said, <S%H559><s%> "He is; see, <S%H2009><s%> [he is] ahead <S%H6440><s%> of you. Hurry <S%H4116><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> for he has come <S%H935><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> have a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the high <S%H1116><s%> place <S%H1116><s%> today. <S%H3117><s%>

"As soon as you enter <S%H935><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> you will find <S%H4672><s%> him before <S%H2962><s%> he goes <S%H5927><s%> up to the high <S%H1116><s%> place <S%H1116><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> will not eat <S%H398><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he comes, <S%H935><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he must bless <S%H1288><s%> the sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%> afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> those who are invited <S%H7121><s%> will eat. <S%H398><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, go <S%H5927><s%> up for you will find <S%H4672><s%> him at once. <S%H3117><s%>"

So they went <S%H5927><s%> up to the city. <S%H5892><s%> As they came <S%H935><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> was coming <S%H3318><s%> out toward <S%H7122><s%> them to go <S%H5927><s%> up to the high <S%H1116><s%> place. <S%H1116><s%>
Now a day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Saul's coming, <S%H935><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had revealed <S%H1540><s%> <S%H241><s%> [this] to Samuel <S%H8050><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"About this time <S%H6256><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> you a man <S%H376><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> him to be prince <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he shall deliver <S%H3467><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%> For I have regarded <S%H7200><s%> My people, <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> their cry <S%H6818><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to Me."

When Samuel <S%H8050><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H6030><s%> to him, "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> I spoke <S%H559><s%> to you! This <S%H2088><s%> one <S%H2088><s%> shall rule <S%H6113><s%> over My people. <S%H5971><s%>"

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> approached <S%H5066><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> in the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me where <S%H335><s%> the seer's house <S%H1004><s%> is."

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "I am the seer. <S%H9536><s%> Go <S%H5927><s%> up before <S%H6440><s%> me to the high <S%H1116><s%> place, <S%H1116><s%> for you shall eat <S%H398><s%> with me today; <S%H3117><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> I will let <S%H7971><s%> you go, <S%H7971><s%> and will tell <S%H5046><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> that is on your mind. <S%H3824><s%>

"And as for your donkeys <S%H860><s%> which were lost three <S%H6><s%> days <S%H7969><s%> ago, <S%H3117><s%> do not set <S%H3117><s%> your mind <S%H7760><s%> on them, for they have been found. <S%H3820><s%> And for whom <S%H4672><s%> is all <S%H4310><s%> that is desirable <S%H3605><s%> in Israel <S%H2532><s%>? Is it not for you and for all <S%H3478><s%> your father's household <S%H3605><s%>?"

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Am I not a Benjamite, <S%H1145><s%> of the smallest <S%H6996><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and my family <S%H4940><s%> the least <S%H6810><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>? Why <S%H4100><s%> then do you speak <S%H1696><s%> to me in this <S%H2088><s%> way <S%H1697><s%>?"

Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his servant <S%H5288><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into the hall, <S%H3957><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them a place <S%H4725><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of those who were invited, <S%H7121><s%> who <S%H1992><s%> were about thirty <S%H7970><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the cook, <S%H2876><s%> "Bring <S%H5414><s%> the portion <S%H4490><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> you, concerning which <S%H834><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> to you, 'Set <S%H7760><s%> it aside. <S%H5973><s%>'"

Then the cook <S%H2876><s%> took <S%H7311><s%> up the leg <S%H7785><s%> with what was on it and set <S%H7760><s%> [it] before <S%H6440><s%> Saul. <S%H7586><s%> And [Samuel <S%H8050><s%>] said, <S%H559><s%> "Here <S%H2009><s%> is what has been reserved! <S%H7604><s%> Set <S%H7760><s%> [it] before <S%H6440><s%> you [and] eat, <S%H398><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it has been kept <S%H8104><s%> for you until the appointed <S%H4150><s%> time, <S%H4150><s%> since I said <S%H559><s%> I have invited <S%H7121><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>" So Saul <S%H7586><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> with Samuel that day. <S%H3117><s%>

When they came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the high <S%H1116><s%> place <S%H1116><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> [Samuel] spoke <S%H1696><s%> with Saul <S%H7586><s%> on the roof. <S%H1406><s%>

And they arose <S%H7925><s%> early; <S%H7925><s%> and it came <S%H1961><s%> about at daybreak <S%H7837><s%> that Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> on the roof, <S%H1406><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Get <S%H6965><s%> up, that I may send <S%H7971><s%> you away. <S%H7971><s%>" So Saul <S%H7586><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and both <S%H8147><s%> he and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out into the street. <S%H2351><s%>

As they were going <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> "Say <S%H559><s%> to the servant <S%H5288><s%> that he might go <S%H5674><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of us and pass <S%H5674><s%> on, but you remain standing <S%H5975><s%> now, <S%H3117><s%> that I may proclaim <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to you."
